<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_286</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_286</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Fracciones, decimales y porcentajes</string>
            <string language="en">Fractions, decimals and percentages</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brüche, Dezimalstriche und Prozentsätze</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fractions, décimales et pourcentages</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Frações, decimais e porcentagens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Frazioni, decimali e percentuali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέρη, δεκαδικά και ποσοστά</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones el concepto de fracción. Se estudian las operaciones que se pueden llevar a cabo con las fracciones y su aplicación al cálculo de porcentajes.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to explain fractions and the operations that can be carried out with fractions, including their application to the calculation of percentages.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">fracciones</string>
            <string language="en">fractions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">operaciones</string>
            <string language="en">operations</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">racional</string>
            <string language="en">rational</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">números</string>
            <string language="en">numbers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">porcentajes</string>
            <string language="en">percentages</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, Brüche und die Operationen, die mit Brüchen 
durchgeführt werden können, einschließlich ihre Anwendung der 
Prozentrechnung zu erklären.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'expliquer les fractions et les exécutions qui peuvent 
être effectuées avec des fractions, y compris leur application au 
calcul des pourcentages.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações explicar 
as frações e as operações que podem ser realizadas com frações, 
including sua aplicação ao cálculo de porcentagens.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
spiegare le frazioni ed i funzionamenti che possono essere effettuati 
con le frazioni, compreso la loro applicazione al calcolo delle 
percentuali.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να εξηγήσει τα μέρη και τις διαδικασίες που μπορούν να 
διενεργηθούν με τα μέρη, συμπεριλαμβανομένης της αίτησής τους 
στον υπολογισμό των ποσοστών.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brüche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Operationen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">rational</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zahlen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Prozentsätze</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fractions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">exécutions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">raisonnable</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">nombres</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pourcentages</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">percentuali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μέρη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διαδικασίες</string>
          </keyword>
